items.title: Classroom Assistant
items.description: Help our teachers with daily activities, reading to children, and facilitating play-based learning.

items.title: Thanksgiving Meal Service
items.description: Join hundreds of volunteers preparing and serving meals to families during our annual event.

items.title: Administrative Support
items.description: Assist with office tasks, data entry, organizing materials, and communication.

items.title: Special Events
items.description: Help plan and execute fundraising events, community gatherings, and celebrations.

benefits.title: Service-Learning Hours
benefits.description: Earn credit for community service requirements at FSU, TCC, and other institutions.

benefits.title: Resume Building
benefits.description: Gain valuable experience working with children, nonprofits, and community organizations.

benefits.title: Community Connection
benefits.description: Build meaningful relationships and make a real difference in Frenchtown.

benefits.title: Personal Growth
benefits.description: Develop leadership skills, empathy, and a deeper understanding of community needs.

applicationSteps.title: Contact Us
applicationSteps.description: Reach out via email or phone to express your interest. Tell us about yourself and what you'd like to do.

applicationSteps.title: Complete Application
applicationSteps.description: Fill out a brief volunteer application so we can learn more about your skills and availability.

applicationSteps.title: Background Check
applicationSteps.description: For positions working with children, we require a simple background check for everyone's safety.

applicationSteps.title: Orientation & Training
applicationSteps.description: Attend a brief orientation to learn about our programs, policies, and your specific role.

applicationSteps.title: Start Making Impact
applicationSteps.description: Begin volunteering and become part of the Project Annie family!
